channel.title: Cybersecurity on Bishop's Corner
channel.description: Recent content in Cybersecurity on Bishop's Corner

item.title: Navigating Global Data Protection Compliance: Frameworks, Regulations, and Implementation Strategies
item.author: james (James Mwangi Kamau)
item.description: Explore essential data protection regulations including GDPR, HIPAA, PCI DSS, and Kenya’s Data Protection Act. Learn compliance strategies, sector-specific requirements, and legal considerations for penetration testing and audits.

item.title: IAM Privilege Escalation via Policy Rollback
item.author: james (James Mwangi Kamau)
item.description: Explore how attackers exploit IAM policy rollbacks to gain administrative access in AWS environments. This CloudGoat scenario demonstrates privilege escalation techniques, policy version analysis, and critical cloud security hardening practices.
